Summary: was outside when a ball of light showed up then turned triangle.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was with a friend in side my house when we decided to go smoke at about 12:30 or 1:00am when we saw a bright ball of light appear and disapear my heart started racing cause I knew it wasn't an airplane it moved to fast for it to be an airplane of some sort. When it apeared again it had turned from ball of light to triangle with lots of flashing lights. I told my friend go grab a camera. He told me to keep an eye on it. He began to film about a minute when it just took off out of sight. We were both surprised and excited about it. We rewined the film and saw it again. We still were surprised at what we saw. My friend had just got out the army, he said he never saw no militery craft like that. So we believe it couldn't be militery. (We have video of this but couldn't post it)
trends: There have been 221 other sightings in Chicago
There were no other sightings in Chicago on or around July 31st 2009
